data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Diego Rubio scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Diego Rubio puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 10, Younes Namli instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Colorado at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 12, Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Colorado defenders.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Colorado's Kellyn Acosta is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Ramy Touchan has awarded Colorado a corner.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
Colorado pushes forward through Younes Namli, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 19, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aaron Herrera (Salt Lake) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Colorado's area.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 28, Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Colorado takes a corner from the right.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
In the minute 33, Ramy Touchan awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Corey Baird gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Colorado have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 37, Ramy Touchan awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Ramy Touchan has awarded Colorado a corner.
In the minute 40, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Andre Shinyashiki of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 41, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Free kick Colorado.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Colorado's Kellyn Acosta misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
The home team have replaced Justin Meram with Douglas Martinez. This is the first substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
Salt Lake drive upfield and Albert Rusnak gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Colorado defender.
In the minute 47, Corey Baird (Salt Lake) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal! Sam Vines extends Colorado's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Younes Namli to set up the goal.
In the minute 51, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 53, Ramy Touchan signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Colorado's half.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Donny Toia (Salt Lake) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
Robin Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Braian Galvan replacing Younes Namli.
Goal! Braian Galvan extends Colorado's lead to 0-4.
In the minute 55, Cole Bassett with an assist there.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a second substitution, with Pablo Ruiz replacing Everton Luiz.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Cole Bassett (Colorado) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
Douglas Martinez (Salt Lake) has been sent off!
Free kick Colorado.
Jonathan Lewis is replacing Diego Rubio for the away team.
In the minute 65, Jeremy Kelly is replacing Keegan Rosenberry for Colorado at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Colorado's Braian Galvan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Salt Lake are caught offside.
In the minute 69, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Jack Price (Colorado) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 73, Salt Lake make their third substitution with Sam Johnson replacing Corey Baird.
The home team have replaced Justen Glad with Erik Holt. This is the fourth substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Colorado needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
Collen Warner is on a sub for Kellyn Acosta for Colorado.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Andre Shinyashiki with Nicolas Mezquida.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Braian Galvan of Colorado gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 81, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Maikel Chang with Jeizon Ramirez.
Nicolas Mezquida for Colorado gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 86, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Colorado close to the penalty box.
In Sandy Colorado attack through Nicolas Mezquida. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 88, Great finish from Cole Bassett to give Colorado a 0-5 lead.
That's a fine assist from Jeremy Kelly.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ramy Touchan blows to end the match. The final score is 0-5.
